title: Compare effects of Newton and Darwin on culture

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the differences between the impact of Newtonian physics on European culture and the impact of Darwinian biology on European culture.

frqParts.text:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the differences between the impact of Newtonian physics on European culture and the impact of Darwinian biology on European culture.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
